header.title: Roach
header.subtitle: Rep
header.description: Imagine a home where children play freely on the floor, pets roam happily, and there’s no room for unwanted pests. That’s the promise Rep brings—a chemical-free, environmentally conscious solution to cockroach control. Our innovative formula works like nature’s own defense, creating a smart, invisible barrier that confuses and disrupts cockroach behavior. Within just seven days, the problem starts disappearing, and your space remains protected for up to 90 days. No harsh chemicals, no worries—just a safe, effective solution that cares for your family, your pets, and the planet. Whether it’s a cozy home or a bustling office, Rep ensures a healthier, pest-free environment without compromise.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Meet Emerald, the green goddess of facial oils. Emerald Deep Moisture Glow Oil provides skin with rich moisture and a glow that is lit – all in a lightweight, quick-absorbing formula. All hail, Queen Emerald.
